page.title: 09TRADE
page.content: TRADE Shops in Buxted. Butcher's Shop in Buxted sells meat, milk and cream.The Post Office and general stores stocks all items except meat, it has a delicattesson section and bakes its own bread from premade frozen dough. The newsagents sells the stock associated with its name. At the other end of the village there is another grocer's shop.George Rose's two shops specialise in the do it yourself range of goods and has a thriving range of equipment for hire.Seven men are employed here. His other shop specialises inpicture framing. The garage sells petrol and deals in fiat cars.Seven men are employed here. Once famous for its chicken factory just closed down.
